DoubleVectorProperty.name: MaxCorrespondenceDistance
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The maximum correspondence distance for aligning the cloud data.

IntVectorProperty.name: MaximumIterations
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The maximum number of iterations used during the alignment.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TransformationEpsilon
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The maximum allowable translation squared distance between two consecutive steps for the optimization to be considered as having converged.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TransformationRotationEpsilon
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The maximum allowable rotation difference between two consecutive steps for the optimization to be considered as having converged.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: EuclideanFitnessEpsilon
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The maximum allowed Euclidean error between two consecutive steps for the optimization to be considered as having converged.
